decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number (s):

D01 (Existing Ground and First Floor Plan); D02 (Proposed Ground and First Floor Plan); D03 (Existing and Proposed Roof Plan); D04 (Existing ELevations); D05 (Proposed Elevations); D06 (Proposed Sections); D07 (Block Plan); D08 (Site Plan), received on 21/11/23.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow a pitched roof instead of a flat roof in relation to planning permission reference 224806HH dated 10/01/2023 for ' Single storey rear extension (following part demolition of existing single storey rear addition)
